Package it.polito.dp2.NFFG

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LinkReader
    An interface for accessing information about the existing connections between two network nodes.
    NamedEntityReader
    An interface for accessing the main information associated to a generic entity (e.g., network node, policy, etc.) associated to the NffgVerifier interface.
    NffgReader
    An interface for reading the data associated with a Network Function-Forwarding Graph (NF-FG).
    NffgVerifier
    An interface for accessing a set of Network Function-Forwarding Graphs (NF-FGs) and the policies to be verified on these NF-FGs.
    NodeReader
    An interface for accessing the data associated with a network node.
    PolicyReader
    An interface for reading the data associated with a generic policy.
    ReachabilityPolicyReader
    An interface for accessing the data associated to a ReachabilityImpl policy.
    TraversalPolicyReader
    An interface for accessing the data associated to a Traversal policy, which is a particular kind of ReachabilityImpl policy.
    VerificationResultReader
    An interface for accessing the main information associated to the verification of a policy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NffgVerifierFactory
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the NffgVerifier interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FunctionalType
    The Functional type of a network node indicates the network functionality implemented by that node.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NffgVerifierException
    Thrown if an implementation of NffgVerifier cannot be created.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FactoryConfigurationError
    Thrown if the implementation of the concrete factory is not available or cannot be instantiated.
